body.p: This tutorial describes how to store and retrieve a number of simple EMF objects. This tutorial is based on the well known library example used in EMF tutorials:

ul.li: Click here for the EMF library example using a XML Schema
Click here for the EMF library example using a Rose model

body.p: This tutorial assumes that you have done one of these two tutorials. The image below shows the projects which should be present in the workspace.
This tutorial will guide you through the following steps:

ol.li: Add the runtime plugin to the library model project
Setup initialization code and create and store a Library with a number of Books and a Writer
HQL queries to read the library and its content
Use an EMF resource to read the library and its content
